Description.Text: Pusynas Hotel & SPA Druskininkai is a friendly 3-star hotel offering cosy accommodation in the heart of Druskininkai. Highlights include a spa and an international restaurant. Druskininkai is a spa town known for its abundance of natural resources. Situated close to the lake, the hotel is well placed for guests to easily experience all the town has to offer. Nearby attractions include Druskininkai water park, Grutas Park, the Snow Arena and Vilkes Golf Club. Druskininkai bus station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Druskininkai destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise building with oriental design features and balconies on every floor. Facilities include a spa where guests can indulge in a massage or dead sea therapy treatment. Standard rooms are decorated in a simple style with red tones. Rooms feature access to a private space on balconies which wind all the way around the hotel. Amenities include a fridge, satellite/cable TV and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The restaurant offers Lithuanian and European dishes. Free parking is possible onsite.
